scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const p = path.join(process.cwd(), '../..', 'node_modules/@prisma/client'); const n = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules/@prisma'); if (!fs.existsSync(n)) fs.mkdirSync(n, { recursive: true }); const c = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules/@prisma/client'); if (!fs.existsSync(c)) fs.symlinkSync(p, c, 'dir');"
